name: Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum
about: What it is:An ultimate hydrating must-have with two percent hyaluornic acid to hydrate the skin, leaving it smoother and plumper..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Lightweight Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:This product is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This super ingredient is capable of holding 1,000 times its weight in water. Formulated with multiple molecular weight hyaluronic acid to hydrate different layers of the skin plus a Matrxyl 3000u2122 peptide, it reduces the appearance of fine lines while plumping skin.
ingredients: -2% Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers hydration across multiple layers of the skin.-Matrixyl 3000u2122 Peptide: Plumps, firms and smooths skin's appearance ...Water (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hyaluronic Acid, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1........The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use in the AM and PM..-Onto cleansed skin, apply a pea-sized amount to the fingertips and gently pat into the face and neck..-Follow with preferred serums and moisturizer. ..Precautions:.-Avoid contact with eyes..-External use only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum comes in a compact plastic bottle with a matte feel and flip top lid. Though a standard 1 oz size filled to the brim with product, it appears an inch shorter than other same volume products that comes in glass bottles as it is sans dropper. Seems great for travel with a firm fitting lid.  Compared to other similar products, the consistency is runnier and lighter weight while still being a serum. It hydrates and plumps, and does not sting or burn like humectant forward serums can. However if worn alone in dry rooms there is a sensation of drying out.   Instructions differ from applying to u201cdamp skinu201d to applying on u201ccleansedu201d skin. If applied on dry cleanser skin, the serum feels a touch tacky. If applied on damp skin (such as after toner) some of that tackiness dissipates. (The label emphasizes using the product as the very first in your routine; however it sounds as though applying after toner should be fine if damp skin is also ok, as toner is mostly water.)  This product box claims u201c2% pure hyaluronic acidu201d and has sodium hyaluronate as its third ingredient with u201chyaluronic acidu201d further down. Having both sounds common in formulas for different hydration properties.   Underneath it also claims u201c2% Matrixyl 3000,u201d which is a trademarked name for a peptide blend manufactured by Sederma consisting of palmitate tetrapeptide-7 and palmitoyl tripeptide-1.   Matrixyl 3000 is considered to be the newer, advanced form of Matrixyl. However, Matrixyl 3000 is clinically tested to be effective at 3%, and the peptides on the box appear last in the ingredients list. Below regulated 1% phenoxyethanol reservative and usually 0.5% radish root ferment filtrate.   While I canu2019t speak to this discrepancy, my experience has been positive. My oily, dehydrated skin is subtly but noticeably plumper in look and feel. The product is also not prone to pilling in my multi step skincare routine. I can recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I liked about this Hyaluronic Acid Serum from Inkey List is the packaging. It very clearly indicates what itu2019s supposed to do (hydrate and plump), what type of skin itu2019s best suited for (all), and when to use it (am & pm). It even has a pronunciation guide so that you can feel confident saying it correctly if youu2019re unfamiliar with anything in the name. It makes it feel really accessible for those just starting to take an interest in skincare, while also providing a great reference and reminder for those who are already more confident and knowledgeable about skincare. The bottle itself is unremarkable in a plastic bottle, but I did like that it was easy to dispense just a drop at a time. The serum consistency is less watery than others, more of a thin gel-like consistency. It applies easily though, and it absorbs so quickly for me!! When I did a skin test on my hand, it took a little bit longer to absorb, so this might vary based on skin type (I have combo/oily skin). After it absorbed, my skin did feel more hydrated, and there was no stickiness, shininess, etc. I did notice some slight tightness to my skin afterwards, but I didnu2019t mind it and felt like it helped to firm my skin.

reviews.review_text: This Hyaluronic Acid Serum from The Inkey List has always been one of my favorites. This serum is the second step in my skincare routine, morning and night. The texture of this serum is smooth and not at all sticky, which I love. Itu2019s also lightweight but so hydrating, making this perfect for my combo skin type. I wholeheartedly recommend this Hyaluronic Acid Serum.

reviews.review_text: okay, this serum is a total must-have! iu2019ve been using it for a couple weeks now, and my skin is seriously *glowing*u2014like dewy, plump, and smooth. itu2019s super lightweight and doesnu2019t leave any sticky or greasy feeling, which is huge because i hate when serums feel heavy. it absorbs so quickly, and you can feel the hydration right away. my skin feels like itu2019s actually *drinking* it in.  i love that it helps with fine lines too (i mean, who doesnu2019t wanna look fresh and youthful, right?) and iu2019ve noticed a difference around my eyes and forehead already. i apply it to damp skin right after i cleanse, like they recommend, and it honestly helps lock in moisture like nothing else. it works great under my moisturizer, and i love how my skin feels plump and soft after. iu2019m also obsessed that itu2019s vegan, cruelty-free, and cleanu2014just makes me feel extra good about using it.  iu2019m definitely going to keep using this. if youu2019re looking for something to boost hydration without that heavy feel, this serum is *so* worth it. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum Review This serum is a budget-friendly skincare essential, ideal for anyone looking to boost hydration in their routine. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving it feeling plump and refreshed. It layers well with other products, making it versatile for both morning and evening use. The 2% multi-molecular hyaluronic acid ensures hydration at multiple levels of the skin, while the added Matrixyl 3000 provides anti-aging benefits. The simple yet effective formulation works well across different skin types, especially for those with dryness or dehydration concerns. Pros: u2022 Affordable and accessible u2022 Lightweight and non-sticky  u2022 Suitable for all skin types  Overall, itu2019s an excellent option for those new to serums or looking to enhance their hydration game without breaking the bank.

What Iu2019m left with is more hydration and softer skin.  My fine lines look plumped as well.  I appreciate that this formula is gentle on my skin.

reviews.review_text: ### The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum Review  I recently incorporated The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum into my skincare routine, and here are my thoughts on its performance and effectiveness:  **Performance:** This serum delivers impressive hydration. My skin feels noticeably more moisturized and plump after each application. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue, which makes it perfect for layering under other products.  **Application:** Applying the serum is straightforward. I use it both morning and night after cleansing and before applying any heavier creams or oils. The consistency is smooth and spreads easily across the skin, which means a little goes a long way. It fits seamlessly into my routine without any fuss.  **Ingredients:** The main active ingredient is hyaluronic acid, known for its ability to retain moisture. This serum also includes Matrixyl 3000, a peptide that supports skin firmness and elasticity. The formulation is simple yet effective, free from unnecessary additives, making it suitable for sensitive skin.  **Results:** After a few weeks of consistent use, my skin feels softer and looks more radiant. The serum has helped reduce the appearance of fine lines, likely due to the increased hydration. My skin's texture has improved, and it appears more even-toned. I also appreciate that it doesn't cause any breakouts or irritation, which can be a concern with new skincare products.  **Overall Impression:** The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum is an excellent addition to any skincare regimen, particularly if you are looking to boost hydration and improve skin texture. It offers high performance at an affordable price point, making it accessible for many. Given its clean formulation and effective results, I highly recommend it for anyone seeking to enhance their skin's moisture levels and overall appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Title: Lackluster Performance: The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Review  I recently tried out the Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid, and unfortunately, it didn't quite meet my expectations. While hyaluronic acid is known for its hydrating properties, I found this product to be rather mediocre in performance.  One of the main issues I encountered was with the product packaging. The bottle design made it difficult to dispense the right amount of product, often leading to either too much or too little being dispensed. Additionally, the cap didn't always close securely, which caused some leakage and messiness, making it less than ideal for travel or on-the-go use.  In terms of effectiveness, I didn't notice any significant improvement in my skin's hydration levels or overall appearance. While it did provide some moisture, it wasn't anything remarkable compared to other hyaluronic acid serums I've tried.  Overall, while the Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid may be budget-friendly, its lackluster performance and poor product packaging make it difficult for me to recommend it wholeheartedly.

reviews.review_text: The serum has a slightly watery gel texture. It squeezes out of the bottle easily enough into my hands but without dripping, so it's pretty easy to apply with fingers, no need for cotton rounds or a tool. It spreads easily as well. It is lightweight and absorbs pretty quickly, but it leaves a slightly tacky feeling on my skin and looks a little shinier than my skin does with just my moisturizer. It does layer well, I haven't experienced any pilling or anything when putting moisturizer on top of it or a thinner toner underneath. It doesn't have any fragrance or scent that I notice. I've only been using for a few days and haven't really noticed much of a difference. No irritation, but my skin doesn't look or feel particularly more moisturized/hydrated or plumped.  The bottle is opaque, which is kind of annoying because I prefer to able to see how much volume I have left of my products. It is small enough to travel easily (about the size of a typical bottle of eye drops) and doesn't have the bulk of a dropper and the lid seems secure, but I do wish either the bottle or the box had come with a seal just to make sure none spilled out or was used before it got to me.  In general I would say it's okay, perfectly fine but not something that is so good that I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum, and I must say it has quickly become an essential part of my skincare routine. This serum has been a game-changer for my skin, delivering outstanding hydration and leaving me with a noticeably plumper and more youthful complexion. First and foremost, I was impressed by the simplicity and transparency of The Inkey List's formulation. The serum contains 2% hyaluronic acid, which is a powerhouse ingredient known for its ability to attract and retain moisture. The absence of unnecessary additives or fragrances makes it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin like mine. One of the standout features of this serum is its lightweight and easily absorbed texture. Upon application, it effortlessly sinks into the skin, delivering an instant burst of hydration without any greasiness or residue. I found it particularly effective when applied to damp skin, as it helps to lock in the moisture and enhance its benefits. After incorporating The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum into my routine, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall hydration of my skin. My complexion appeared plumper, smoother, and more radiant. Fine lines and dry patches were visibly diminished, and my skin felt supple and nourished throughout the day. Additionally, this serum worked wonders in enhancing the efficacy and absorption of my other skincare products. I also appreciate the packaging of The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum. The sleek and minimalistic design not only looks great on my vanity but also ensures that the product remains fresh and protected from exposure to light and air. The dropper dispenser allows for precise and hygienic application, ensuring that I can use the perfect amount each time. Furthermore, I must highlight the affordability of this product. The Inkey List has always been known for offering high-quality skincare at an accessible price point, and this serum is no exception.

reviews.review_title: What I expected from a hyaluronic acid serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The serum is clear and watery. I like that it's in a squeeze bottle because it feels more hygienic than dipping into a jar of product.  The viscosity does make it hard to apply if you're not expecting it to be so thin. But other than that, it goes on easily, has no scent, and is absorbed in a minute or two. I recommend waiting at least a minute before moving on to the next skincare/makeup step because my face felt sticky until the serum was fully absorbed. After the minute or so, my face just feels like normal, hydrated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using hyaluronic acid in my skincare routine. It keeps my skin hydrated and helps maintain a healthy moisture barrier. The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum contains 2% pure hyaluronic acid and 2% Matrixyl 3000, which supports natural collagen production.  I apply the serum to my face and neck twice a day, on damp skin after cleansing and before applying other treatments (including toner) and moisturizer. I like the texture of the serum u2014 it is liquid, very lightweight, and fast-absorbing. Itu2019s not sticky or greasy at all. My skin is very sensitive, and Iu2019m glad that Iu2019ve never experienced any irritation with this serum. It helps soothe and calm my irritated skin. The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum gives the skin a smoother, more youthful appearance, and improves skin elasticity and firmness, reducing the appearance of aging over time. I also value that it is fragrance-free, which is great for people like me with allergies and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Sephora as a Sephora Community Insider Ambassador, however all opinions are my own.  I have very dry and dehydrated skin so hyaluronic acid is something that is involved in my skincare routine already.  I added this in to my current routine and found that it didn't offer anything that my other products already were giving me.  I tried removing some of my regular serums and found that only using this one, made me miss my regular products.  This is okay for what it is, however I prefer my skincare to be a more cosmetically elegant.  I want to the experience of using it.  This serum is just a bit one note for my liking.  I prefer my other serums that incorporate HA as an ingredient.  This one hasn't done anything bad to my skin.  But it hasn't done anything great either. If you already have a very basic routine that you like and just want to add a little something to it, this is fine.  If you already have other products with HA in them, you likely do not need this.  But... at this price, it doesn't hurt to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using hyaluronic acid serums in my skincare routine for almost two decades and have tried them from all different brands - clinical brands, cosmetic brands, clean brands, luxury brands, drugstore brands, etc. This one from The Inkey List performs beautifully and I was happy to receive another bottle as gratis during the holidays. I've been incorporating it into my morning skincare routine since then and have enjoyed how it keeps my skin soft, hydrated and supple.   This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.   SKIN TYPE: normal to dry and becomes more dry the further we get into winter  SKIN CONCERNS: dehydration, dryness/lack of moisture   WHAT I LIKE:  * Affordable and effective * Lightweight  * Not sticky or tacky  * Absorbs quickly and smoothly  * Packaging is simple, clean, minimalist (but see below) * Layers nicely * Moisturizing / hydrating  * Performs well under makeup - no pilling  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT:  * Would love to know how much product is left or remaining - maybe with a thin-ish clear strip so you can see how much product is in the bottle? * Would love to see ingredients list on the bottle itself, together with instructions that it should be followed up promptly with a moisturizer * Would be nice if this has a dropper (but that would increase the cost)  FYI: * On the watery side consistency-wise, but has just enough viscosity to keep it from dripping everywhere; it does run a bit though   * Contains peptides (known for their anti-aging properties) * Unscented  * Suitable for all skin types (unless you are allergic to or have a sensitivity to hyaluronic acid or another ingredient in the product). Iu2019ve used this when my skin has been combo oily as well as normal to dry/very dry and it has performed beautifully regardless of my skin type.   BUY ud83dudecdufe0f or BYE ud83dudc4bud83cudffc?:  * This isn't just a good hyaluronic acid serum for the price; it's a good hyaluronic acid serum, period.  * BUY

I also got these products and asked the person working in skin care at the store if they would be okay being used together (the oil I use and this serum) and they looked at the ingredients and said yes. So I know itu2019s not because of that.   Once I took this out of my routine, my skin went back to normal.  This product just wasnu2019t for me.  Posting this because my skin is extremely sensitive and I didnu2019t realize it was this product because I felt no burn whenever I used this, so it took me a little bit to realize what it was and had to remove it out of my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Hyaluronic acid serum complimentary from The INKEY List. I was pretty excited to receive this since I have severely dehydrated skin that I end up picking at and before I know it I have destroyed my skin barrier! I have been trying to find a solution to this and I believe I found one!  Dehydrated skin is caused by lack of water which leaves skin dull and dry skin is caused by lack of oil which causes flakiness. I suffer from both dehydrated and dry skin unfortunately.  First you want to make sure you start off with a clean face, then make sure you add some water to make your face damp (I get mine pretty wet) because this is a hydrator which increases the water content in your skin and it cannot do so without water and will often result in dryer skin if you donu2019t use it properly. Anyways after applying this you can apply any toners, exfoliating treatments, target treatments or eye treatments. I like to use a vitamin c serum after and then make sure to follow that with a moisturizer! This is a very important step since it helps seal the moisture into the skin!   This is recommended to do both in the AM and PM however, I would be sure to apply a SPF in the morning (last, after everything else).  This has helped me tremendously in repairing my skin so far and I am hopeful that with this in my beauty arsenal I will finally break free from this lackluster skin and have healthy, glowing and well hydrated skin! This has a wonderful price tag  however I do wish it were available in a larger size because this wonu2019t last too long. I plan on purchasing this again and trying more products from The INKEY List as well!!

The only thing giving the ordinary the edge is that their bottle is glass (I believe both companies are owned by the same people though). I like this one the best by far, it feels less thick and oily than others I've tried, it absorbs really well and isn't sticky and it's a really good price. My skin is well hydrated, obviously pairing this with a good moisturizer is key, which moisturizer will depend on your skin. This won't do anything helpful without moisturizer! I always stock up on this when I get to go to sephora, rather than risking running out and having to grab the ordinary from ulta.  HA is a key important part of my routine, I definitely see and feel a difference if I skip it. I'm 34 and have tried all sorts of skincare but HA is here to stay for me, it makes a big difference in how my skin feels (not tight or dry, bouncy, plump, soft).

reviews.review_text: I had all but given up on HA serums in this price point - often too sticky, do not absorb well and result in pilling of makeup. I find a lot of people seem to not understand fully what HA is or how it works, it is not a moisturizer in itself, HA helps your skin retain moisture. It's the first thing I apply after washing my face and/or stepping out of the shower, while my skin is still a little damp even, and it works so well! Very comparable to much more expensive product when using correctly. MY only con is the packaging, I really wish it had a dropper or pump, something to help control the amount of product you get. But this is a great buy for anyone looking to boost their skin routine.

reviews.review_title: Tip - Apply to damp skin under moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A couple tips from a Sephora employee. This serum is a holy grail for my dry skin!   The best way to apply it is onto wet/damp skin, ideally after cleansing, then let it sink in and seal it in with a moisturizer. If you skip those steps it can actually make you even drier.  The reason is that this serum mainly contains humectants (hyaluronic acid + glycerin) which are ingredients that grab onto water molecules. If there's not enough water around then the humectants can actually suck the water out of your skin instead. And without any barrier on top it'll all just evaporate away. So make sure you pair it with water and a good moisturizer!

Perfect under thicker moisturizer and pre and post procedures like micro needling. It is substantially better than comparably priced HA serum, and has an impressive ingredient list. I do need to apply a thicker moisturizer over this, but it provides a great lightweight base.

Iu2019ve been using it only at night and, a couple weeks in, Iu2019m not impressed.

reviews.review_title: Do not sleep on this HA.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using HA daily since 2020 and since then I have tried many HA products from all over the price scale so I feel confident in saying that The Inkey List HA is hands down the best formula. This works just as well, if not better, than most Mid to Higher end products Iu2019ve tried and each time I have strayed to a HA product with prettier packaging, I have always come back to The Inkey List. Itu2019s a small bottle but you do not need more than a small amount. Especially when you apply to damp skin. It glides on smooth and doesnu2019t pill with other skincare products, sunscreen, or makeup. Gentle on my skin and did not sting or cause any irritation. Does the job of the $40+ HA products. Seriously guys, the money youu2019ll save on this HA can be used on other other pricier products that are worth the $$$ and hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this hyaluronic acid serum is the best Iu2019ve ever tried! Pat it in gently on damp skin and follow up with a moisturizer and you have plump and moisturized skin!! Itu2019s so hard to find a good hyaluronic serum that isnu2019t sticky, doesnu2019t pill when you add other serums on top AND does the job!!! Holy grail product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best HA! Feels amazing and very inexpensive. And best part is itu2019s not sticky at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been loving all the Inkey List products! This hyaluronic acid serum is great! Very similar to other formulas from other more expensive brands and I love the added bonus of the Matrixyl 3000! I donu2019t know how much is in there but for under $8 as an added bonus, Iu2019ll take it! The formula is a very light, almost watery gel and it absorbs very quickly into skin. It does leave skin a bit tacky for a minute but thatu2019s a plus when applying makeup most of the time and if youu2019re using it before bed you should be topping it with an occlusive and emollient moisturizer anyway which takes away that tackiness. Plus more expensive serums also leave this tackiness, I donu2019t really think of it as a negative. Just be sure you are using your hyaluronic acid serums correctly because if applied wrong they can have the opposite effect and dry your skin out more by sucking moisture from the skin. You should apply it to a damp face (either freshly washed or sprayed with water or mist) and then top it with an emollient and occlusive moisturizer to lock the moisture in. Anyway, definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites! Makes my skin feel very hydrated without leaving a sticky residue (unlike many hyaluronic acids I've tried)!

I have put this on immediately after showering/washing my face while thereu2019s still some dampness to my skin, but if I donu2019t follow up with my moisturizer super quickly, it still leaves my skin feeling tight and sorta crusty as it dries down. I donu2019t like feeling like I have to rush through my routine and I donu2019t like having to follow up with another product (occasionally when I want to let my skin breathe Iu2019ll just use a serum instead of a full routine which I canu2019t do with this). My skin is generally pretty hydrated so Iu2019m not sure how effective this serum is, but I definitely didnu2019t experience any sort of amazing transformation. You really canu2019t beat the price, so if youu2019re on a budget it might be a good one to pick up, but I think Iu2019ll stick to my other hyaluronic products (I like dr Dennis gross hyaluronic marine hydration booster) even though theyu2019re more expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is AMAZING.  I am relatively new to hypotonic acid, but canu2019t speak more highly of this product. I have been using this for over six months now, day and night, right after I wash/cleanse and tone my face. This provides instant hydration. I love this product and would recommend it to anyone.  The only reason I give this 4/5 is the bottle/nozzle. This product would be better suited in a dropper style bottle/applicator. I find that the nozzle/lid, where the product comes from, clogs SO easily. I store this with the lid upright, and the product can kind of form a seal/glue over the opening (I find this starts to happen about 1/3 through the bottle), and the lid clogs. Although I have become u201cused tou201d this, it doesnu2019t make it any less annoying. So many times I will be trying to gently get product out, and the nozzle will be clogged, so I try with slightly more pressure, and (more often than not), a massive amount of product comes out.  Of course I can make use of this product by extending it onto my neck or perhaps applying to the tops of my hands, but I know how much of this product I need at a time, and donu2019t appreciate u201cwastingu201d product on areas I donu2019t intend to use the product (however great it may be).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In Brittany Broski fashion, this product is *DELICIOUS*   The price for this product is so good for those who want to try skincare but donu2019t want to break the bank.   Itu2019s not super thin, or super thick. The consistency soaks right into your face and is amazing paired with other skincare products or makeup. Itu2019s simply something you NEED to add to your collection.  You can mix this in with a moisturizer, use with another serum, put on your lips, your eyes, your body moisturizer, your HAIR, your dried up makeup products, whatever you want girl! She does it all! Literally!   My favorite uses: I love using this on my lips as a prep before lip balm or lipstick. I have also added this to the tips of my hair after swimming for extra moisturizer along with a leave in conditioner. When my ABH brow pomade was dry and gross, I added a drop and mixed it up. Now the product acts as if itu2019s brand new. Added it to my dry HUDA beauty foundation and created somewhat of a tinted moisturizer. When I had eye dermatitis I applied a little bit to help reduce the flaking and itchiness and it made them feel so much better!   Itu2019s safe for all skin types and has so many uses!!!!! If youu2019re oily, this would be great to balance out your skin and restore your moisture barrier!!   I seriously have no bad things to say about this product, itu2019s a staple and Iu2019ll always have multiples on hand for basically anything. Do yourself a favor and get it!  My skin type: normal, sensitive, body eczema.

I didn't find this product bad, necessarily. But it didn't REALLY hydrate me much. It did feel nice on the skin, it soaked into the skin quite fast and it layered well with many brands of skincare..Lancu00f4me, Fresh, Moon Juice, etc. It also played well with makeup products..but it just didn't give my skin the big drink of hydration it needs before using makeup or even overnight.

I donu2019t love the packaging for dispersing of the product, as it is not as easy to control the amount as a pump or dropper. If the price is good though, I can look past the packaging. I have normal to dry skin. I'm dry especially on my cheeks. Forehead and chin are pretty normal. The only part of my face that is oily is my noise. I have no acne issues and my skin reacts really quickly if it doesn't like something. I didn't put a lot on my face: I cleansed, I put on the hyaluronic acid and finished with a moisturizer. The pimple was there the next morning. I waited 2 weeks and tried again during a night routine and  BAM, the next morning, another huge cystic pimple on my lower jaw. I had to return. I now use the Vichy 89 with no issues.

I am excited to see more changes as I have only used this product for one week straight so far.  I am hoping my foundation will apply better. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing: it is inexpensive and does such a great job hydrating my dry skin. It feels great on - spreads easily, absorbs quickly and when it dries it doesn't feel like anything is on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just to start, Iu2019m a teen who deals with acne, scarring and my skin is combination (more dry though). I also use tretnoin (a prescription strength retnoid) to treat my acne. I find that my skin often craves hydration and this stuff is like a tall drink of water for your skin. It feels so hydrating and it plumps the skin. It also is light and easy to layer with other products. I also like how this has some peptides to support the skin. And the price is really the best part, like, you canu2019t beat it. Now, you have to use this correctly for it to work. First, you have to apply it on damp or moist skin, so either after your toner and essence or you can literally just spray your face with water and your pat it in (thatu2019s what I do). This is because hylaronic acid is a humectant that draws moisture into the skin, but you need to provide the hylaronic acid with that water for it to draw moisture in instead of drawing moisture out form your skin and dehydrate your skin. Using it over damp skin also prevents any tackiness. You also must use a moisturizer after to continue providing it with moisture. I use this in the morning and it is really nice, love how it plumps the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hyaluronic acid is SO good, especially for the price! I bought this a few months ago and was super impressed by it. I use a generous amount morning and evening and it lasted me 4 months! It worked way better for me that The Ordinaryu2019s HA serum. I ran out of it two weeks ago an decided to try out Glow Recipesu2019s Plum Plump HA serum because of the VIB sale discount and because I love their products, but I actually much prefer the Inky Listu2019s because it gives me the same results (maybe even a bit more hydration?), but it applies so much better than Glow Recipeu2019s. GR gets kind of white and frothy when I work it into my skin, and can sometimes pill under makeup depending on what other products I use with it. I switch up my moisturizers and extra serums every other day because of clashing ingredients, and I never had an issue with pilling with this one as opposed to GR. Once I finish plum plump Iu2019ll for sure come back to this HA serum.   *also a tip: I mix in a few drops of The Ordinaryu2019s Amino Acids + B5 into my HA serum to create a more liquid texture to work into my skin better and boost hydration with the added benefits of the amino acids and vitamin B5. Itu2019s really been helping with the dry patches Iu2019m experiencing due to using prescription retinol cream.

reviews.review_title: V moisturizing on dry, acne prone, sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is dry, acne prone, very sensitive, with fine lines and the beginnings of eye bags. I also have asthma and fragrance sensitivities so the way a product smells is make or break for me. Lately my routine, which has worked well for a while, just hasn't been doing it for me anymore. I've developed texture on the part of my cheeks near my nose and mouth and the surface there peels after just a few hours. It didn't matter how I exfoliated, the only time my skin wasn't getting shriveled and flaky was when I had a layer of vaseline over the top of my skincare.   Glycerin and vitamin E oil helped, but not enough, so I decided to try hyaluronic acid. WOW. I've been using it for 2 days and it's made a visible difference already. The shriveled texture in the super dry cheek area is almost gone, the smile lines that were starting to form have started to plump back up, and the fine lines around my eyes are gone on one eye (the good eye) and reduced on the other.  I did a patch test on my arm, a patch test on my face, and have used it over my whole face 4 times, and no reaction. If my skin doesn't like something it gets red bumps in less than a minute and so far, everything is clear. It doesn't have a fragrance (thank you Inkey!) or a chemical smell that bothers my lungs. Make sure you apply it to damp skin, and that it's the first thing you put on. On one side of my face I tried it layered the way I do glycerin, which is over my moisturizer and eye cream (I have to apply the glycerin that way for it to work), but it actually worked better on the side of my face where I applied it the way Inkey recommended, which is as the first layer.   I also got the Inkey collagen booster and will review that when I've used it a few days to see how my skin likes it. I didn't want to try it until I had a chance to assess how the HA worked for me. The hyaluronic acid from Inkey is a keeper for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best simple hyaluronic acid ever. Iu2019ve used over 5 bottles!!! I always start with this after I double cleanse and it sets the tone for the rest of my regimen. I usually donu2019t take the time to write reviews but I appreciate this brand so much and want them to stay in business so this product and continue to thrive!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I never tried a hyaluronic acid serum before because I have a lot of products and many have HA in them. I have combo skin and my chin has been flaking terribly... I saw a video the same day saying if this is the case for you, moisturizer won't cut it, you need HA. I was scared to use it wrong, and end up drier, plus I also usually buy higher end products, so I was skeptical. People are not joking, this thing is superrrr tiny (looks trial sized) and only half full, but for $7 whatever. After my first use my skin felt plump and hydrated like never before!!! I am absolutely shook and never going back. You just have to make 100% sure you follow the HA rules- apply on wet skin and lock in with a moisturizer. The packaging is awesome too, tells you eveything you need to know about HA, how to use it, what step it goes at in your routine, and how to amplify it's benefits based on your needs (what to pair with if you want to target dullness, fine lines, more hydration, etc.). Will be continously purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this new product as I heard that it was better than the Marine Hyaluronics from The Ordinary, but it's significantly worse. It makes my face tight especially around my nose and cheeks. I put it on after pat drying my face after washing it and even keeping it dripping wet since lots of people say your face needs LOTS of moisture from water for it to work. But it doesn't work either way. And I don't want to have to hassle to make a hyaluronic acid (or any step of my skin care) to work for me. The Ordinary Marine Hyaluronics worked just fine for me after pat drying my face right after washing it and makeup/sunscreen went on smoothly when I put my moisturizer over it. Will be steering friends away from The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid. Not worth the extra dollar from The Ordinary. Even non-skincare brands have better products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My dry skin has been so much happier ever since I started using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. I used this product for about a month and noticed results. My skin was hydrated even during the cold winter months and the overall texture of my skin improved. I used to have a lot of texture and smile lines and this made a noticeable difference. I definitely recommend keeping this in the bathroom so you can apply it right after you wash your face since it works best on damp skin, and then I follow with a gel based moisturizer to lock in all the moisture. This is amazing for the low price point but I just wish the packaging was better. sometimes I accidentally pour out too much, I think a dropper would be better but got the price itu2019s not a big deal.

reviews.review_title: New Staple for My Skincare Routine!

reviews.review_text: Hydrating, doesnu2019t have a sticky texture and relatively affordable, this product has become a new staple to my skincare routine! Will definitely be repurchasing in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! Not greasy or sticky at all. Compared to other HA serums, this one is by far the best one since it absorbs really quick into the skin. I usually spritz my skin with a facial spray and pat this serum on my skin right after. Give it a few secs to continue with your next product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For $8 this product has changed my face. I have never written a skin care product review but I feel too strongly to not speak up! This POTION has changed my pores, acne, and overall glow. Highly highly recommend if dealing with clogged pores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few days now a s love it so far. It goes on smooth. However, it isnu2019t as hydrating as I need for my skin right now. Remember to apply to a wet face. I will layer with more occlusive products for max hydration while looking for another HA to try, to see if it is the HA or something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few minor reasons why this brand of HA impressed me but one very big and personal reason. The big reason is that, and I'm not sure if it was coincidental, but the night I switched to this HA my active night products didn't cause any sort of discomfort. 24 hours prior to that, while I used up the last of a competing brand HA, I was toughing out an intense burning sensation from my evening products. These products were working to repair my moisture barrier and basically the dryer the skin, the harsher it feels and I would tough it out with tearful eyes until the following night when I tried this product and didn't feel a thing from my active products. I'm wondering if the other brand may have been causing dryness to my face if that's the case? Either way, I have noticed that my skin has felt and looked plumper/healthier after switching to this formula.  I also appreciate how thin this formula is, that there's no weird smell, it doesn't emulsify and it doesn't dry down sticky...all of which my previous HA had a tendency of.

reviews.review_title: didnu2019t work for me but hereu2019s why
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product and was super disappointed that it didnu2019t work for me. I did like how my skin texture felt smoother. It helped balance my skin in my more oily to normal areas of my face but dried me out in my problem areas(around my mouth and sides of my cheeks). After looking more into hyaluronic acid (something I should have done before) I realize it could possibly be due to the environment/climate that I live in. This acid is meant to draw in moisture from the air but, since I live in a dry climate (So Cal) that is not what happened. It felt either dry or like I didnu2019t have it on to begin with. This would probably work a lot better for someone that lives in a more humid climate since there is so much more moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: cause some breakouts / didnu2019t get the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a week morning and night , along with the Q10 serum, the peptide cream during the day and the bakuchiol cream at night in place of the peptide.    I didnu2019t feel any added moisture to my face at all. I normally donu2019t have dry skin, but I started feeling some facial discomfort with this product line.  At the end of the week, I have a small break out on my nose and my forehead. I normally donu2019t break out. I donu2019t think my skin needs to adjust to these products, I really donu2019t think I am going to continue using them. I feel like my skin is somewhat getting worse, my forehead looks dryer in some spots now and I noticed some lines were I normally didnu2019t notice anything.   Also the bottle.. becareful, when you squeeze it out; you get more then a pea size. Better design is warranted.  Two stars because it seems to work for others, But itu2019s just not for me. My skin become a little bit more picky after my pregnancy, but I was hoping with these price points I could find something worth having. I used to use the fresh products; that started causing break outs too. Herbivore lapis oil and dr jart cream helped calm my skin down over night from the use of the inkey list products I mentioned; guess I will stick with those.

Also, when this serum is applied to cleansed, moisturized skin, red spots appear in the form of a rash on the face.  They do not itch and pass very quickly.  But be careful. I think I will use other brands of hyaluronic acid serums.

Even the lines on my forehead are smoothed out and barely noticeable.  My eltamd tinted sun protectant and it cosmetics translucent powder applies smoothly after.  As a busy mom of 2 I have really struggled to make moisturizer a part of my routine because they often take ages to absorb into the skin but this serum absorbs into the skin effortlessly and the results on the skin are impressive.  I am sold after just a few wears and will be purchasing more.  I just wish it was offered in a larger bottle.

I bought this for my husband and he has been using it for 4 weeks now. It took away all of his dry skin spots and is such a bargain price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! I definitely saw a difference in my skin after using this for a week! I have sensitive skin and this isnu2019t irritating and is definitely worth a try. Amazing at night and in the morning especially in the cold winter months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great Hyaluronic acid serum it isn't too watery and it mixes well with my other products and my skin feels great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will recommend I see a difference in my face my acne has cleared up my face is smoother also First time trying I love it

reviews.review_text: It does its job. I really enjoy that it doesnu2019t leave my skin feeling tacky after applying it and letting it dry, unlike The Ordinary HA. Although I like the formulation of this one better, I feel like The Ordinaryu2019s dropper makes it easier to use less product and lasts longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best formulations of HA that I've used. It isn't tacky in the way the HA from The Ordinary is. My only gripe is that it does take a good amount to cover my entire face which makes the bottle empty out much quicker than others at this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product! This keeps your skin plump and supple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product for beginners. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Words canu2019t describe just how much this product is amazing. Iu2019m so grateful I found this. I never used serums as part as my regular beauty routine but after reading reviews and doing some research I definitely knew this will be a must purchase! I bought this with the beta-hydroxy acid (this one hydrates and the beta purifies) and theyu2019re just awesome. I sometimes donu2019t even put on day or night cream. I find the serums so light that you can put on your other beauty products without any problem. I rarely experience bad acne but it happened recently and didnu2019t know how to get my normal skin back. I also sometimes notice red bumps on my skin in the morning. When I started using this, I saw how everything started clearing. It helped with redness, acne, scarring. I highly recommend this and with another acid if you have oily, acne prone skin. Thank you to the company and Sephora for this great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product and I have no complaints but I do have an issue with one of the bottles I picked up for purchase at a store... one of the bottles was open and was about halfway used up. I threw it away because I donu2019t want to risk using a used bottle but I hope Sephora checks their products please...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very hydrating and does its job, the only drawback is itu2019s small size u2014 I bought it probably one month ago and am almost out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this hyaluronic acid for about a month now and it is just okay. It doesn't plump the skin like I would like it to even when I use more product. I have pretty dry skin so I just need something stronger I guess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product! I like to layer it with a Vitamin C serum and I find it gives a good boost of hydration. A little sticky when you first put it on and I wish that it came in a bigger bottle but itu2019s still amazing especially for the price point. Will repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to find a clean, inexpensive hylaurnoic acid, but I don't notice a difference and the it's a small container even if it did work.

reviews.review_title: This HA makes The Ordinary look... Ordinary
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used TO's Hyaluronic Acid for two bottles and got this to try as an alternative since they're similar in price point. I prefer this one - to be honest I find my skin more hydrated than I did with The Ordinary's. I also like that this one instructs you to apply on damp skin - GAME CHANGER. Since HA holds moisture, you should have damp skin at the time of application so that there's something for the HA to suck in. I also like to spray with a mist after application to add some extra hydration. Knocking a star off as I HATE the bottle it comes in - the plastic is cheap and it's too hard to control how much comes out at once. I emptied mine into my just-finished TO HA glass bottle with dropper and it's much better.

reviews.review_title: donu2019t believe the hype. thick, sticky, & useless
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried all types of HA and even gotten injections that have HA to fill fine lines. I bought this because I like other The Inkey products and was disappointed. I feel like it has done nothing to add to my skin care routine. Iu2019m a product junkie and use probably 12+ skin care products night and day each day. When I added this I actually felt like my skin was even more dry. I hate the texture as well. I find it sticky and thick. It makes me sweat when I layer it with my other products. I really wanted to like it, but it just wasnu2019t for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried The Ordinary's hyaluronic acid, and I liked it..but I wanted to try another brand. I finally got this after finishing up The Ordinary. The day after putting this on, my skin was irritated. I stopped using it, healed it up and returned it. The consistency & viscosity of The Inkey List is watery and sticky compared to The Ordinary; I find The Ordinary quite thick and heavier. I also noticed that my face had much more moisture and plumpness to it when I used The Ordinary. I did not like the type of dispenser/container that the Inkey List chose, I prefer a dropper (however The Ordinary needs to improve their dropper). I'm not biased, I don't prefer one brand over the other, I am simply comparing the 2 based on my experience. I think I will go back to The Ordinary: my skin did not break out, wasn't irritated, was much more plump, and I prefer the dropper.
I cannot layer with this serum under a moisturizer because the serum will pill. Feels a little silicone-y vs. moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is one of the better HA serums Iu2019ve used in this price point. Im 30 and I have dry, eczema prone skin and this works a lot better than the ordinary which I personally felt did nothing when I used it and felt weird on the skin. Highly recommend if youu2019re looking to add a boost of hydration at an extremely affordable price point. I will say the bottle is REALLY small, 1oz  so it wonu2019t last more than a month I feel if you use it day and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I recommend it to everyone. I suffer from a very oily nose and bad dry patches on my forehead an around my mouth. For the first time in my life my skin has balanced out, thanks to this serum! I use it in the morning and at night. It is a miracle worker for me! I took off one star because I wish it had a dropper. It is too easy to accidentally get too much product. I just bought a dropper and remove the lid so I'm not wasting so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great stuff! I have combo skin and find this helps my dry areas while not over-moisturizing my oily parts! And it is great under makeup u2014 kind of grips it like a primer.   LOVE that there is no smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I been using it as apart of my AM/PM skin routine for a little over a month now. Once I got the regime down and started using this consistently I started to see instant results with pimples and dark spots. I just purchased my second bottle. I wish it came in bigger sizes.

reviews.review_title: yu2019all NEED this serum! like now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually never write reviews because I never see any amazing results from skin care products, except for this!  This product I have only used for about four days and already my skin is so much more hydrated and looking goood! Iu2019ve never seen such quick results from a product before. Yu2019all this serum is no joke and needs to incorporated into everyoneu2019s skin care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight and non-greasy formula which I instantly fell in love with, but broke me out few days later. :( I even bought two bottles but I will have to return. Iu2019m sticking with the ordinary u201cbuffetu201d at the moment. Might work better for non-sensitive skin types.

reviews.review_title: Good HA- not sticky at all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its much better than The ordinary. Its not sticky, absorbs well and make skin plump. Prepares your skin for next product without making skin sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried a few different brands of hyaluronic acid and none have been has nice as this one. Other brands are almost too watery that itu2019s near impossible to spread evenly on my face. This serum is slightly thicker and doesnu2019t leave a sticky or tacky feeling on my face. I use it on damp skin and have noticed a huge difference in the moisture in my skin. I will not go without this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave the ordinary serum a less than stellar review and I was excited to try this to compare. This is so much better because it's a less sticky formula, it sinks super well into the skin, and it actually hydrates appropriately. I started using this when my skin was going through a massive dry spell as we moved into cold weather and my topical acne creams. It worked instantly to actually soothe and relieve my irritated, dry skin.  The con is I noticed it was breaking me out a little (for reference the TO one did not break me out, and I have very sensitive and reactive skin). Minus one star for that.  Overall so worth it for the incredible price point and what it actually is able to accomplish. I'm sad I only bought one bottle because I will go through it so fast and it's currently out of stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good! it absorbs into your skin so quickly and it stays in. I was hesitant about trying this line because i have sensitive skin, but this product (and the retinol) didn't irritate it at all! It helped me achieve that glass skin texture, which i love. Overall, it made my skin look and feel really good, plus it's super affordable! win/win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Still trying this out, but I like it so far! I was using the Ordinary HA and I just hated the sticky texture. This serum is thin and sinks right in, leaving your face soft and ready for moisturizer. So far, very happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t remember how I came across this product or even brand but Iu2019m so glad I did. I was a u201cThe Ordinaryu201d stan but when it comes to the hyaluronic acid serum, THIS ONE is the best!! It just absorbs into your skin so fast and itu2019s so smooth and makes your face feel so soft. I had honestly forgotten to apply moisturizer this morning after applying this serum because my skin was so soft I thought I already did! Thatu2019s how good this product is. Iu2019m definitely going to try some other products from this brand now.

reviews.review_title: Really great base for other products

reviews.review_text: Easy to use and fast absorption! Pair it with a thicker serum and youu2019re bound to be more hydrated. I wish it came in a larger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Inkey List has produced another affordable product that performs.  If you have dry, dull, dehydrated skin, this product is for you. The bottle is on the smaller side but a little goes a long way. You will love it!

It's an amazing product and the price point is just phenomenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Leaves your skin so moisturizer and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great!! It seriously makes your skin glow! For the price, you wonu2019t be disappointed. I order multiples at a time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't say the serum did wonders for my skin. I use it at night, right before going to bed. It does make my skin soft and plump(and a little sticky). For now, it's good for days I want my skin to feel and look hydrated and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and it didnu2019t hydrate my skin enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a hyaluronic acid serum, this is a good one to use, especially for the price.  I ultimately decided that I get the same benefits from using a moisturizer with HA in it and don't feel like this is a necessary step in my skincare regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall an okay product. I bought this after using Glossieru2019s hyaluronic. I loved that but the price was impractical. This wasnu2019t bad for the prize so I tried it. I naturally have a combination skin type. Itu2019s okay but sometimes my face ends up super dry, the opposite of what this is supposed to be doing. Other than that the formula is not irritating, not too much harsh or thereu2019s no stinging feeling. Itu2019s quite sticky when first applied buy dries non sticky. Give it a try since itu2019s super cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this formulation. Its light and non-sticky and perfect for any skin type. I reccomend this to all my friends

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum seriously does not mess around. I've struggled for a while to find a serum that doesn't make me break outu2014I have both dry and sensitive skin, which is a horrendous combo that pits most products against themselves when it comes to how my skin reacts to them. So this? Total miracle.  Affordable? Check. Effective? Check.  The smell is light but pleasant, and although it does leave my hands a bit sticky at the end of application, it doesn't leave my face feeling that way. The hydration levels are off the charts and my skin is so, SO happy. Can't recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With all of the hype I've seen around this brand, I was expecting so much more from this product and the brand in general.  Full disclosure, this is the first hyaluronic acid serum I've used, but from reading the reviews of other serums, I'm pretty sure they aren't supposed to leave your face sticky and 1000x drier than it was before you started using the product. I've tried using this on both wet and dry skin and it leaves my skin sticky either way, though a little less sticky when used on wet skin. Plus the amount of product you get is NOT an oz. Its probably more like 0.07 oz. Yeah I know its only $8 or whatever, but I still want what they are saying they are selling me! Overall, I'm not really impressed with anything I've tried from this brand, and I probably won't be repurchasing this product either. Sorry The Inkey List.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hyaluronic acid by The Inkey List is superior than the The Ordinaryu2019s Hyaluronic imo. Doesnu2019t leave a sticky feeling and less product is needed. Overall, satisfied with how this product makes my skin look and feel.
Love it, better than the ordinary. It doesnu2019t leave the skin sticky and you only need a small amount

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try this particular serum since I tried the ordinarys HA serum three times and it was never for me... TO's HA serum was way too sticky and tacky for my liking. This one however is the total opposite! It's so lightweight and quick absorbing while leaving your skin plump and hydrated and NOT TACKY WHATSOEVER! I'm so happy with this product and it did not disappoint! Thank goodness it's also so affordable too. Will definitely repurchase in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When applied on damp skin it absorbs amazingly. No residue or film. I apply five different hydrating serums/moisturizers after this one with absolutely no product piling. Currently holding off on my regular repurchase of B-Hydra because Iu2019m seeing the same plumping, and amazing production absorption results with this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this for about 3 days and itu2019s like it absolutely sucks the moisture out of my face! Even after putting my moisturizer, then occlusive (petroleum jelly) on, my skin still feels dry all day. Iu2019m going back to the hydro boost Neutrogena HA serum (unscented). At least with that, my face felt juicy all day, and even until the next day with my night tome routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Hyaluronic acid feels SO great on the skin! Super lightweight and doesnu2019t feel too tacky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Only hyaluronic acid Iu2019ve tried that isnu2019t sticky, better than the ordinary. Skin feels super hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My face is left feeling amazing, so smooth and hydrated. Would repurchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use it daily and my skin hasnu2019t been flaky or dry since

reviews.review_title: The BEST HA Serum Hands Down!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best hyaluronic acid serums Iu2019ve ever used! I found this by chance at Shoppers Drug Mart a while back, then couldnu2019t find it anywhere! I am BEYOND happy Sephora sells this in Canada now! The formula is ultra light, absorbs quickly, layers well with other products, and as with all serums a little goes a long way. I have oily/combination, acne prone skin with dry patches from prescription retinoids, and this makes my skin feel soft, plump, and hydrated. I love that itu2019s simple and straightforward, without any extra fancy ingredients to jack up the price. This serum is unbeatable and will always be a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been loving this hyaluronic acid!! I've been combining it with the the inkey list vitamin c serum in the morning and I find its been helping my skin absorb my moisturizer. I have eczema patches on my face and this has been really helping lock in the hydration. So far its been outperforming other hyaluronic acids that I've used!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: leaves a weird film on your skin. donu2019t recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, keeps my skin super hydrated. Has no smell and no irritants

reviews.review_title: Solid Product for a Reasonable Price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I added this product to a new skincare routine about four months ago now, and just repurchased this.   So far itu2019s been good, overall my skin has been smoother and definitely more hydrated with fewer flaky dry spots.   The texture of the serum is sticky at first but dries down eventually. As others have noted, the packaging makes it hard to control the amount that comes out, and I often find myself with extra serum on my fingers. The only other issue I have with this serum is that it tends to clog my pores in certain areas of my face (the sides of my nose especially) occasionally, leaving me with pimples. Otherwise, it hasnu2019t upset my skin and it seems to have a hydrating effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. It is a bit more expensive than the cult favourite The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid, but the texture is much better. Itu2019s light and not as thick. It also absorbs quickly into the skin. Must have for the colder seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the formula is thinner compared to the ordinaryu2019s HA serum. I prefer that one more. I feel like this one doesnu2019t do much for my skin in terms of plumping and hydration. maybe better suited for someone with oily skin who needs less moisture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become a new favorite of mine. No-nonsense hydration for my combination skin. The serum soaks in quickly and instantly hydrates. My skin is happy and content. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to be honest, I was really doubtful that this serum would do anything for me! I tried The Ordinaryu2019s hyaluronic acid serum and just felt like it was sticky with no pay-off. But, I would buy this one over and over again. Whatu2019s most noticeable to me is that the hydration just fills in and plumps any fine lines I have on my forehead and creates this beautiful canvas for my day. I also love that HA improves the penetration of your other serums to follow. Iu2019ll never be without it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this stuff. I have combo skin always being dry in my chin area and this insures I donu2019t get dry or flaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've recently purchased several products from THE INKEY LIST, and although I'm truly enjoying the products and their effects, I honestly can't stand the way most of them smell!! I secretly call this brand, THE STINKEY LIST because just about everything I've tried so far, smells like melting plastic. Thankfully, the smell does not linger at all, and I prefer this to having artificial or covering up fragrances added. We all know by now that there's no place in skincare for fragrance or scents.  As far as the product itself, it's a nice gel texture that absorbs nicely and helps my skin feel more hydrated and plump. The price is right and packaging is great. My only complaint is that they don't seal the tops of any other bottles. This is just common sense and I wonder how they get away with that..?? All in all, 5 stars!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Best thing EVER to happen to my skin & my wallet!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. I have been looking for a substitute product for Sunday Riley's Good Genes, because the cost for that is astronomical and I am really trying not to make overpriced skincare a lifestyle choice over here. I read a few articles that recommended the Inky list Hyaluronic and the ceramide night serum, so at this price point I figured why not and threw both in my cart.   The Hyaluronic acid alone steals the show- I've tried against Hyaluronic acid from The Ordinary and it came out as the real winner. I also tried it against The Ordinary's Lactic Acid + HA, and decided that the Inkey list one works better for my skin during the day, and the Lactic Acid is better for night (+ the ceramide night treatment). I use this product as the first thing on my skin after washing my face in the morning. I don't usually wear much on top of it because it really makes my skin feel plump smooth and hydrated, but have tried with primer (benefit porefessional) and power or liquid foundation as well (bare minerals matte formula)- both went on super smooth and blended in even more beautifully than on top of a regular cream/face lotion. On top of that, this tiny little bottle has lasted me wayyy longer than I feel like it should have (going on month three here for an $8 product)  TLDR; I am HOOKED on this serum - for the price and the results, this has served me better than La Mer, Sunday Riley, Tatcha or Laneige. Stocking up now after seeing some of the other Inkey products have sold out so quickly

reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and LOVE this product. I use it during my evening skincare routine and it always makes my skin look very refreshed and plump. It is super lightweight and can be used under other serums. My only complaint is that the bottle is a bit small, but for the price you can't complain.

I thought it was the Water Cream until I ran out of this serum! I went a few days without it (didnu2019t have a chance to get to the store) and my skin was oily and dull. This product will always be a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hyaluronic acid serum makes my skin feel more plump. I have extremely dry skin, and this definitely helps with the lack of moisture. Something about this serum just works well with my other skincare products. After cleansing, I apply my toner and essence. Then, I make sure that I apply this serum very quickly and layer on my moisturizer. I heard somewhere that your face should be moist before applying the serum, and this is the most effective way of using it. If you have dry skin, give the serum a go and try to follow this tip!

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this with the renewing salicylic acid cleanser from cerave + the pm ultra lightweight lotion from cerave. My oily to normal skin has been really liking this routine, and I think this serum is a simple, cheap addition to a good routine. That said, do NOT use the serum on its own. It is imperative to pair this serum with a moisturizer, no matter your skin type. Hyaluronic acid pulls moisture from wherever it can get it and that includes your face if you have not placed a moisturizer over it. But hey, itu2019s worth a shotu2014itu2019s nothing groundbreaking nor does it have the best formulation but it does the job while you donu2019t need to break the bank. I recommend!

I would use a product with this acid already in it as it it is more stable and has something to pull from as well already. Then apply a moisturizer over it as normal.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic product. I have very dry, reactive, sensitive and red-prone skin, and though Iu2019ve only been using this in my routine for two weeks, Iu2019ve noticed a huge difference in all those former problem areas. I havenu2019t had any flaking in my usual trouble spots, nor any tightening sensations that can come with over-dry skin. This leaves my face feeling soft and looking bright and healthy. But most amazingly and rather unexpectedly, my constant and difficult to cover redness (rosacea exacerbated by a blood thinner) has been kept in check truly like never before. I used to have to heavily color correct, then use full coverage foundations and concealer to make it look like I wasnu2019t in the running for Best Tomato at the state fair, but since adding this into my routine twice a day, Iu2019ve been able to dab some tinted moisturizer or skin tint on and be good to go, which is something Iu2019ve honestly never experienced in my 38 years. Itu2019s very light on the skin, not tacky at all, sinks in easily and relatively quickly, and works well with my other serums and oils. I also didnu2019t have any kind of reaction or irritation to it, nor any comedogenic issues. Iu2019ve actually got another bottle already in my cart, because I refuse to live without it. A must have for any skincare routine.

It's very nice especially for how cheap it is, but during the winter it's a tricky ingredient to use.

If you have super dry skin, I donu2019t know if this will be enough. Itu2019s nice for layering and good for the 7 skin method, if thatu2019s something you do. If youu2019re oily, I think you would like this as your hydrator/moisturizer step because it wonu2019t make you greasy whatsoever. Great for daytime and under makeup- no pilling. The other is from a popular western brand which unfortunately pilled horribly, even when used by itself; I could never get it to work for me.   The INKEY List Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum is hydrating enough for me to wear alone under moisturizer, but also plays well when layered under or over other serums. Iu2019ve had no issues with product pilling when using this which is a major plus is my book. It does have a more watery consistency, compared to the other serums Iu2019ve used, so this might be why it layers so well.  So far, Iu2019m really enjoying this serum and itu2019s definitely a future repurchase.
