Iu2019ve almost finished my bottle and happy to say that Iu2019ll be buying more! This budget friendly serum has worked amazingly well with my skin. I can already see the difference in my skin texture and sun damaged areas. To me thatu2019s a huge deal because I know the longer I use it the more results Iu2019ll see.   The Inkey List Serum has faded out the really fine lines that I had around my mouth and eyes. And  I can also tell a difference with some of my deeper wrinkles on my forehead, that is what has surprised me the most! My sister came over yesterday and she touched my forehead and asked me what I did, haha! I showed he the bottle and sheu2019s ordering some.   I have to say that this is by far the best results Iu2019ve seen in any serums that Iu2019ve tried and Iu2019ve tried a good amount over the last 5 years. Iu2019m excited to see what continued use will do for my aging skin and to see what other amazing products The Inkey List has! Iu2019m so glad I tried this and I highly recommend it, Iu2019m about to purchase a bottle right now after writing this review!

reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive this full size Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum for free in exchange for my honest review. Iu2019ve been trying it for a few weeks. I use it after cleansing and before my regular serum and/or moisturizer. Some days I use this then skip straight to sunscreen. On its own, it feels a bit sticky but I think the trick is not to use too much product - I find that a dime size is plenty. For me, I prefer my hyaluronic essence that I already own and use so I probably wonu2019t repurchase this. However, if you donu2019t have a hyaluronic acid product in your rotation, I think this is one you may want to start out with - especially at this amazing price point. What this does is preps your skin to retain the rest of your products and makes everything work better. Your face will thank you! I knocked a star only because the hyaluronic ingredient in this product is a bit down on this list - I think #5 or so - and I believe there are superior products out there and the fact this feels sticky. Truly though - for this price?! You canu2019t go wrong. If you hate the sticky feel, you may want to use only at night.

reviews.review_text: At this price, you canu2019t beat inkey listu2019s HA serum. So many expensive serums say theyu2019re moisturizing or hydrating, and itu2019s this simple ingredient.  Itu2019s hydrating without being sticky and Iu2019ve had a lot of issues with HA serums in the past so Iu2019d stick to using oils for hydration. This nicely mixes with moisturizer if you donu2019t want to risk pilling.   Inkey List is interesting and affordable, not sure if these will be my holy grails but cheap enough to experiment and use as a supplement to my other serums. I wish theyu2019d change the cap to a squeeze flip top, because this kind of cap to this tiny size bottle doesnu2019t work well and squeezes out the wrong amount of product. Also to be more environmentally  friendly, increase the volume of the product? Itu2019d be silly to have to rebuy this every month or so. Thatu2019s the issue with affordable products and the amount of packaging waste.   I received this product for free through Influenster.

reviews.review_text: I love how this feels on my skin. It goes on smooth and makes my face feel refreshed but doesnu2019t cause shinniness. I would definitely buy it again. The reason for 4 stars would be that I donu2019t see myself using it long term because my face isnu2019t that dry but for people with dry skin this would work wonders.
This has helped keep my skin healthy and hydrated through the change of seasons. No more dry patches for me. Iu2019m hooked!

reviews.review_title: Best base for serum mixes!!! my holy grail serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hyaluronic acid! The texture is so smooth, not greasy or sticky and really sinks into the skin. I often use this as a base to make u201csmoothiesu201d One drop of this with a pump of my c-firma from drunk elephant or glow recipe pineapple serum. I also keep it in my skincare fridge! Even better cold

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SO HYDRATING. And that's all you need right? It's a gorgeous formula that isn't heavy or sticky, and leaves your skin so bouncy and hydrated. No fragrances and I appreciate that everything in Inkeylist is simple and elegant, unlike what every other brand out there is trying to do. SO worth the money. This is drug store price and you can get sephora points for it! Yassss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It sinks in well without leaving my skin super sticky (there's a slight tackiness but it goes away). It plays well with other product steps in my routine and doesn't pill. Simple and no frills, the hydration in my skin lasts a significantly longer time period than it has with other Hyaluronic acid serums and toners. I've been using it everyday for a while now and am quickly making work through the bottle but since it's a pretty cheap, restocking on it regularly is an affordable venture.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how much I liked this product!!! I didn't think I would but it's a nice edition to my routine when I need a small moisture boost. I don't use it daily but only when I'm feeling particularly dry and need a quick fix. It packs a powerful punch in such a small bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a holy grail for oily skin. I apply this on damp skin right after cleansing and showering, and it helps my skin dry so soft and WITHOUT that tight feeling. Itu2019s truly like a drink of water for your skin. I strongly believe oily, dry, and dehydrated skin alike would benefit from this serum

reviews.review_title: good product bottle is too small
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The serum itself is good. It absorbs nicely into my skin and doesnu2019t leave a sticky residue or make my makeup or sunscreen pill. The bottle is tiny though. I wish they had an option of a bigger bottle for $14 or 15 instead of having to purchase the small ones. It seems like a waste of plastic bottles and shipping boxes. One small bottle only lasts about a month maybe less if used daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd been using a competitor's hyaluronic serum for years, and it was $34 for .5oz, (so literally 10x more expensive) and decided to give this a try. It's a really nice serum. The only thing I'd want to change is the packaging -- I wish it had a pump. But, for the price, I can't complain. Will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this up on a whim because my BF really likes hyaluronic acid, and I've been loving it myself! I use two drops in the morning and at night and my skin looks and feels more hydrated and I wake up looking refreshed in the morning! The only downside is the amount that's in this bottle, but it is perfect for travel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so moisturized and supple after using the hyaluronic acid! I literally woke up glowy. At first, I started using it at night but incorporated it into my morning routine as well. I will likely go back to just using this at night. Best part, this serum is ONLY $7.99!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review.   My skin loves HA, and this product is as good as it gets. Great texture, and the product really lasts. Definitely will be repurchasing, this is my favorite HA product that Iu2019ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very hydrating and impressive product for the price! The nice plump and hydrating feel is almost comparable to FAB Ultra Repair Hydrating Serum. I can definitely feel the difference in my skin. I would recommend this if you want to get inexpensive product with a lightweight and moisturizing feel. Only complaint is that the bottle is kind of cheap and you can easily squeeze out too much product by accident.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the cheapest and STILL effective HA serums youu2019ll ever find. This is very potent but non irritating. Itu2019s perfect to help your moisturizer and face oils absorb.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this might be too heavy for me since I tend to be oily, but its not at all.  It is great for my dehydrated yet oily skin.  I use it at night after retinol!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really appreciate that this serum is so hydrating and it plays so well with others- I have been combining this with other serums to make a little cocktail, and my face is loving the results!  This sinks in well, no pilling or tackiness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't used it long enough to see if it has made any changes to my fine lines but it has definitely helped with my dry skin. It's still chilly where I live and have some dry patches around my nose/mouth. This serum has been the perfect amount of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good! I have combination skin and this gives me hydration where I need it but dosen't make me look oily in my t zone. The formula is so lightweight, non sticky, non irritating to sensitive skin and it dosen't clog my pores! I enjoy using this prior to makeup application as it gives my skin a burst of hydration! Plus you can get it for a great price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best affordable hyaluronic acid serums I've used! I normally have the Ordinary hyaluronic acid serum in my rotation, but I may fully replace that one with this. I love the texture of this one and how quickly it sinks in/never sits on top of the skin. It also sits really well under makeup, which is an issue I had with past serums. This is also so affordable! The simple packaging is a plus as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Another great pmattifying roduct to mix into your normal moisturizer. I prefer the Polyglutamic Acid a little bit more than this one, and don't believe that you need both. This would probably work best for dehydrated, but oilier skin types, mixed into a mattifying moisturizer. Does not get sticky or greasy throughout the day, though, so that's a major plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS SERUM. Such a steal for $8! Super hydrating, absorbs easily and sits well under makeup. Using it as an alternative to the Hada Labo HA u2014 which is quite a bit thicker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great hyaluronic acid! It absorbs instantly and leaves no sticky residue. I'll use it AM and PM on my face and neck after my toner.   My only complaint is that I always squeeze out more product than I need because of the bottle/cap. I would prefer a mechanism like the one on the polyglutamic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A great quality, super reasonable hyaluronic perfect for a daily dose of hydration. An absolute essential!! Locks in and attracts moisture to keep your skin super plump and refined. I recommend mixing 2 drops or so of this with either the inkey list heptapeptide :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this serum twice a day. In the morning after cleansing, I gently pat it on my skin, helping me waking up. And in the night a mixed it with my moisturizer. My skin looked toned and youthful after just a few application. A little goes along, and budget friendly!

reviews.review_title: My skin has never looked better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing. I have been struggling with my skin over the winter months and have been looking for something. This serum is soothing and hydrating at the same time. I mix it with Vitamin C serum in the morning (which locks in the goodness of each product even better) and retinol before bed. Within one week of using these products, my face has felt softer and more hydrated than it has ever been. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to brighten up their skin and rejuvenate their skin care regime with real, high quality genuine products.
I bought this in Canada and I wish I had bought more. Its my go to for hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks and feels so so so much more supple after just two weeks! I will never stop using this :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute MUST buy - at this price and the superb product I will be buying more! I use this before my serums and has completely sorted out my dry patches
